verses.verse: And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H4480>elders<s%> <S%H2205><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> ye afar <S%H4480>off.<s%> <S%H7350><s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> shall come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H5066>nigh;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> will we <S%H6213>do.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H4676>pillars,<s%> according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> of <S%H6499>oxen<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it in <S%H101>basins;<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> will we <S%H6213>do,<s%> and be <S%H8085>obedient.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

Then went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> of the <S%H4480>elders<s%> <S%H2205><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and there was <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> as it were a <S%H3840>paved<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of a sapphire <S%H5601>stone,<s%> and as it were the <S%H6106>body<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in his <S%H2892>clearness.<s%>

And <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H678>nobles<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he <S%H7971>laid<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> also they <S%H2372>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me into the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> and a <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3789>written;<s%> that thou mayest <S%H3384>teach<s%> them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and his <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> <S%H3427>Tarry<s%> ye <S%H2088>here<s%> for us, <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> we come <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> are <S%H5973>with<s%> you: if <S%H4310>any<s%> <S%H1167>man<s%> have any <S%H1697>matters<s%> to do, let him <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> and the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud.<s%>

And the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was like <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and got him <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2022>mount:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>
